title: Looking for a serious team
body:
Here is my profile on loldb

http://loldb.gameguyz.com/analyze/default/index/200197387/9/484546

I am looking for a serious team who want to improve, regardless of rank.

I have been looking for a serious team for some time now and none have been what I am looking for.

I main adc but can play any other role just as well.

I am very active and always keen to have team practice.

I have over 3000+ games in ranked.

Can use any communication program necessary.

IGN: whitepumah

replies.body:
How about you go and try to create your own ranked team without the rigid requirements that you have been trying to enforce for the last six months? You will probably have more luck doing that than trying to get yourself into a team. 

Here, I even made a template for you to use when you recruit:

IGN:
Preferred positions (list 2):
Preferred champs in said positions:
Rank:
Preferred method of communication:
Times available:

You think I did not try that?

I even had like 2 diamonds in the team told everyone to play what they wanted and we never won a game.
